data.text: @VpwndF THE PRASAD has a new "think"piece forthcoming in his very affordable Substack, which will touch on the very subject of nationalism.
@VpwndF Hmmm, what's the word for a nationalism that sees all dissent as divisive and threatening?
@VpwndF Expertise in constantly looking for excuses to divide is really non a scarcity issue here lol
